articles.description: A young mountain lion that was captured last month after roaming the streets of San Francisco and then released into a wilderness preserve was found dead Friday on the shoulder of a highway in Northern California.
articles.content: A young mountain lion that was captured last month after roaming the streets of San Francisco and then released into a wilderness preserve was found dead Friday on the shoulder of a highway in Northe… [+1352 chars]

articles.author: Allison Schonter
articles.title: Everything Coming to Netflix This Weekend (July 3) - PopCulture.com
articles.description: Netflix is celebrating the Fourth of July and the first weekend of the new month with a fresh slate of new content headed to the streaming library. Beginning on Friday, the streamer will add five new titles to the streaming lineup. This weekend, only a single…

articles.author: Brian Truitt
articles.title: Review: An immortal Charlize Theron walks tall and carries a sweet ax in Netflix's run-of-the-mill 'The Old Guard' - USA TODAY
articles.description: 'The Old Guard' doesn't innovate with its action but weaves new ideas into the Netflix action film starring Charlize Theron as an immortal warrior.
articles.content:
Charlize Theron stars as the leader of a band of immortal mercenaries whose secrets are unearthed in the Netflix action movie "The Old Guard."
USA TODAY
